DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate every possible applicability of flow cytometrical analysis in the intracellular detection of tumor-related material in activated macrophages in the broadest range of cancer types.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Factors for All Types of Cancer Combined
DOC.criteria: (Suspicion of) presence of cancer in the broadest sense of the word Must be able to understand and sign written informed consent
